item.title: Learning DaVinci Resolve - Tutorials
item.description: DaVinci Resolve is the current popular and trending video editing software. In this post I will share the resources for learning DaVinci. YouTube Videos Tips and Tricks How to use Ripple Edting in Resolve to edit faster How To Remove In and Out Markers Transitions Not Working in DaVinci Resolve 16, 17, 18 and How to FIX them So Your TRANSITION is NOT WORKING in Davinci Resolve 19? Zoom ZOOM LIKE A PRO!
